pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Hyaluronic Acid 1% + Niacinamide 2% Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Warnings

CAUTION: This serum contains high percentages of active ingredients. Patch test is essential. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool dry place. Refrigerate after opening. For further information please visit our website.

Common Uses

Hydrates dry skin
Provides long-lasting moisture
Soothes and softens skin
Use on its own as a nightly treatment or to boost the results of a Skin Republic Face Mask.

Ingredients

INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Propanediol, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Niacinamide 2%, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate 1%, Arnica Montana Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Allantoin, Disodium EDTA.

Directions

DIRECTIONS: Cleanse face. Lightly dampen face with water. Apply a few drops of serum to face and neck. Wait for a minute for serum to absorb. For an intensive treatment apply a Skin Republic face mask over serum or follow with a moisturiser.
